class_notes: Online synchronous on Wednesdays, 1pm to 3:50pm, with face-to-face intensives TBD.
course_description: This second course expands on previously taught assessment and clinical reasoning skills. Family Nurse Practitioner (FNP) students will address¿increasingly complex health problems common to the adult and pediatric populations with¿emphasis on primary care management across the lifespan.
prerequisites: NRSG 751D and NRSG 752D or equivalent transfer credits as prerequisite.
